Question: While her mother was pregnant with this person, she and her husband ran an acting school for children in Decatur, Georgia.
Hints: This person co-starred with Denzel Washington in The Pelican Brief (1993), based on John Grisham's 1992 novel of the same name.
This person has been named one of People magazine's "50 Most Beautiful People in the World" eleven times, tied with Halle Berry.
This person had two films released in 2006, The Ant Bully and Charlotte's Web.
